context.p: The following steps describe the upgrading procedure of , valid for Mac OS X:

step.cmd: Back up anything you need from the installation folder of .
Unpack the archive with the new version.

stepsection.note: Do not unpack a new version of on top of an older version. This causes problems because of used libraries that become duplicated.

step.cmd: Copy the backed-up files in the new installation folder.
